headline.main: MEN IN BALTIC STATES ORDERED INTO ARMY; Reich Commissar Gives Choice of Nazi or Own Forces

abstract: Comr Lohse orders men to form special legions or enlist in Ger Army; recent establishment of private property connected with decree
snippet: Comr Lohse orders men to form special legions or enlist in Ger Army; recent establishment of private property connected with decree...

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
